key_modifications: Added Escape key handler for closing popup
Added focus management for backup info popup
Updated Badge component to support forwarded ref
Added onClick and interactive accessibility features
Converted Badge to support button-like behavior

patterns_discovered: React accessibility pattern: Returning focus after modal/popup close
Keyboard interaction pattern: Escape key to dismiss modal
Conditional rendering of component type based on props
gotchas_discovered: Need to handle focus management explicitly in popups/modals
Importance of adding keyboard interaction for better UX
Ensuring interactive elements have proper accessibility attributes
recommendations: Always implement keyboard dismissal for modal/popup components
Use ref forwarding for flexible, reusable components
Add focus management for improved accessibility
Consider adding ARIA attributes to enhance screen reader support
